languages.text: "Магос Винцелекс — мудрейший человек, но его фиксация на эволюционных процессах кажется мне немного чрезмерной. Янус был значительно культивирован: на половине планеты снят лес и срыты холмы. Неудивительно, что и по сей день мы замечаем последствия этих изменений".

traits.locale_text: "Магос Винцелекс — мудрейший человек, но его фиксация на эволюционных процессах кажется мне немного чрезмерной. Янус был значительно культивирован: на половине планеты снят лес и срыты холмы. Неудивительно, что и по сей день мы замечаем последствия этих изменений".

languages.text: "Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."
languages.original_text: "Магос Винцелекс — мудрейший человек, но его фиксация на эволюционных процессах кажется мне немного чрезмерной. Янус был значительно культивирован: на половине планеты снят лес и срыты холмы. Неудивительно, что и по сей день мы замечаем последствия этих изменений".

Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

"Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

"You've been speaking to the Magos, then? A very wise man. However, his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

"Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

languages.text: “文泽莱斯贤者是个非常聪明的人，但他总是固守着进化这个过程，这在我看来有些太极端了。加努斯被广泛开垦，森林被砍倒，山脉被夷为平地，半个行星都经过这样的改造。我们目前依然在追踪这些改造带来的后果，这并不奇怪。”
languages.original_text: "Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

traits.locale_text: “文泽莱斯贤者是个非常聪明的人，但他总是固守着进化这个过程，这在我看来有些太极端了。加努斯被广泛开垦，森林被砍倒，山脉被夷为平地，半个行星都经过这样的改造。我们目前依然在追踪这些改造带来的后果，这并不奇怪。”

languages.text: «El magos Vinzelex es un hombre muy sabio, pero su interés por los procesos evolutivos raya en la obsesión. Janus ha sido objeto de grandes trabajos de cultivo. Se talaron bosques enteros y se arrasaron montañas en medio planeta. No me sorprende que sigamos viendo las consecuencias de estos cambios».
languages.original_text: "Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

traits.locale_text: «El magos Vinzelex es un hombre muy sabio, pero su interés por los procesos evolutivos raya en la obsesión. Janus ha sido objeto de grandes trabajos de cultivo. Se talaron bosques enteros y se arrasaron montañas en medio planeta. No me sorprende que sigamos viendo las consecuencias de estos cambios».

languages.text: 「賢人ヴィンツェリクスはまさしく知恵者ですが、進化のプロセスに固執する様は私にすれば少々極端にも思えます。ヤヌスは徹底的に耕されました。星の半分に至るまで森も山も切り開いたのです。こうした変化がもたらす結果に気づいていても、何ら不思議は無いでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

traits.locale_text: 「賢人ヴィンツェリクスはまさしく知恵者ですが、進化のプロセスに固執する様は私にすれば少々極端にも思えます。ヤヌスは徹底的に耕されました。星の半分に至るまで森も山も切り開いたのです。こうした変化がもたらす結果に気づいていても、何ら不思議は無いでしょう」

languages.text: "Magos Vinzelex ist ein sehr kluger Mann, aber seine Fixierung auf Evolutionsprozesse erscheint mir ein wenig extrem. Janus wurde umfassend kultiviert, und dazu haben wir auf dem halben Planeten Wälder gerodet und Berge eingeebnet. Es ist keine Überraschung, dass wir die Konsequenzen dieser Eingriffe noch immer spüren."
languages.original_text: "Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

traits.locale_text: "Magos Vinzelex ist ein sehr kluger Mann, aber seine Fixierung auf Evolutionsprozesse erscheint mir ein wenig extrem. Janus wurde umfassend kultiviert, und dazu haben wir auf dem halben Planeten Wälder gerodet und Berge eingeebnet. Es ist keine Überraschung, dass wir die Konsequenzen dieser Eingriffe noch immer spüren."

languages.text: « Le magos Vinzelex est un homme d'une grande sagesse, mais sa fixation sur les processus d'évolution me semble excessive. Cette planète a été considérablement aménagée afin de la rendre propice à l'agriculture : les forêts et les montagnes ont été rasées sur la moitié de sa surface. Il n'est pas surprenant qu'un tel bouleversement ait des conséquences durables. »
languages.original_text: "Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

traits.locale_text: « Le magos Vinzelex est un homme d'une grande sagesse, mais sa fixation sur les processus d'évolution me semble excessive. Cette planète a été considérablement aménagée afin de la rendre propice à l'agriculture : les forêts et les montagnes ont été rasées sur la moitié de sa surface. Il n'est pas surprenant qu'un tel bouleversement ait des conséquences durables. »

languages.text: "Magos Vinzelex çok bilge bir adam ama evrimsel süreçlere olan takıntısı bana biraz aşırı geliyor. Zamanında Janus'ta işlenmedik toprak bırakılmadı. Ormanlar temizlendi ve gezegenin yarısındaki dağlar yerle bir edildi. Bu değişikliklerin sonuçlarını hâlâ fark ediyor olmamız şaşırtıcı değil."
languages.original_text: "Magos Vinzelex is a very wise man, but his fixation on evolutionary processes seems a little extreme to me. Janus was heavily cultivated: forests were cleared and mountains razed across half of the planet. It is no surprise that we are still noticing the consequences of those changes."

traits.locale_text: "Magos Vinzelex çok bilge bir adam ama evrimsel süreçlere olan takıntısı bana biraz aşırı geliyor. Zamanında Janus'ta işlenmedik toprak bırakılmadı. Ormanlar temizlendi ve gezegenin bir ucundan diğer ucuna uzanan dağlar yerle bir edildi. Bu değişikliklerin sonuçlarını hâlâ fark ediyor olmamız şaşırtıcı değil."
